fields.name: Subalignments:
fields.value: Head, Evil, Support, Protection, Killing, Investigator, Power, Good

fields.name: Features:
fields.value:
Factional chat
No factional kill
A random Coven member is given the Necronomicon at the beginning of Night 3, which enhances their abilities and grants them detection immunity. Roles with Necronomicon priority always receive the Necronomicon first and the Medusa always receives it last, if applicable. If the member with the Necronomicon dies, it's passed to another random member.
If only one member spawned, they start with the Necronomicon.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose the Coven.

meta.inherit_fields: Goal:Kill all who would oppose the Coven.
